attributes.action: People that visit this country should have to pay for our NHS
attributes.additional_details: When people come into this county they get health care for free, this shouldn’t be the case in my opinion.
attributes.background: Why should people that come to this county get free health care, we don’t when we go anywhere? It’s taking a lot of our NHS money!

rejection.details:
Some overseas visitors to the UK are subject to charges for using NHS services, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

Citizens Advice has published some information about NHS charges for people from abroad. You can find out more here:

https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/health/help-with-health-costs/nhs-charges-for-people-from-abroad/

You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you'd like the current rules to change.

You might like to sign this petition if it calls for something you'd like to happen.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/266935
